summary: Installed Figma Linux (unofficial desktop app) version 0.11.4 using snap package manager on Ubuntu. Installation successful and ready to use. User can now launch Figma Desktop and run the Cursor MCP Plugin to establish connection for design reading.
current_status: Figma Desktop installed. Ready for user to launch Figma and connect the Cursor MCP Plugin. Once connected, I can read Figma designs and complete the homepage implementation based on the actual design files.
